title: How To Get Free Credits on your Shared Hosting plan
content:
If you're shared hosting plan is like mine, and they guarantee 99.9% uptime, I HIGHLY recommend you signup for a **free** [Pingdom.com](https://www.pingdom.com/) account.

So you can set it up to monitor your websites uptime, and it'll generate a report which you can fire off to your host when they fail to meet the 99.9% guarantee.  Moreover it'll email you when your site goes down so you can bug the host to fix the problem.

\*\*DISCLAIMER\*\*   
I am not at all affiliated with pingdom, I just love the service.

### 2019 EDIT

Pingdom is now a paid service, still good, but not as "Free"
seoDescription: Monitor your sites uptime with Pingdom, prove to your host they failed the 99.9% uptime guarantee.
